attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Prime Minister

     My name is Mrs.Alla Madison, my husband is Mr.Aleksander
     Madison and Mss Victoria Madison is my daughter. She is a 15
     years old.

     We are stateless family and we have been getting so much pain,
     since May 2000. Can you stop this abuse, please?

     We need to have an investigation on our immigration file as our
     status is wrong. If we can’t stay in your country, please can
     you help us find another one.

     We are not intentionally homeless and we don’t have any
     documents (passport of any sort) Our position in your country
     is very suspiciously.

     My family are a victim of terror. 

     Yours sincerely Mrs.Alla Madison

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
